word_mean: 横座标：在二维座标系中之水平座标
从y轴(纵轴)到某一点的水平距离，以x表示。参见ordinate

sentence.Network_en: The experimental curve runs nearly parallel to the abscissa.
sentence.Network_cn: 实验曲线几乎与模座标平行.

sentence.Network_en: Therefore, on the complex plane, robust stability can be formulated by minimization of pseudospectra abscissa.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是在复平面上, 鲁棒稳定性问题就转化为伪谱横坐标(伪谱最右端的横坐标值)最小的优化问题.

sentence.Network_en: Of course, this setting only takes effect if the abscissa is displaying a Zero - line .
sentence.Network_cn: 当然, 此配置仅在图表被配置为显示 零线 时生效.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 扬帆远航 - Channe - 网易博客 ... alternate angles 内错角 abscissa 横坐标 account for （数量）占.
...对量的关系没有完全了解。进行调查的距离范围是相当有限的。如果我们对距离进行如下的划分，在这些距离内，供比较的物体呈现在横座标（abscissa）上，而在这些距离上的物体大小看来与纵座标上（ordinate）的标准物体相等，我们从而获得了一些曲线.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (denoting the part of a line between a point on it and the point of intersection with an ordinate): from modern Latin abscissa (linea) 'cut-off (line)', feminine past participle of abscindere (see abscission)

means.word_mean: 1. the value of a coordinate on the horizontal axis
